text:
Fixes and updates for code handling Tables in a word document.

usermodel/Range.java - getTable(), fixes for paragraph references.

usermodel/TableCell.java - Constructor adjusted, accessor methods added for 
cell's TableCell descriptor.

usermodel/TableRow - fixes for indexes, uses new TableCell constructor. 
Accessors for numCells() getCell(x).
creator: piers.taylor@gossinteractive.com

text:
Created attachment 10993
Changes to Range.java, TableCell.java, TableRow.java
